org.cdnomlqko.jglutil.mesh

Class BasicMesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cdnomlqko.jglutil.mesh.Mesh
      • org.cdnomlqko.jglutil.mesh.BasicMesh

  • public class BasicMesh
extends Mesh
    Contains the geometry of a 3d object. Contains the following mesh data: - vertex positions - indices - vertex normals - vertex colors - texture coordinates
    Author:
    CDnoMlqko
